nodes.text: Senaru was a male Arcona, who during the Cold War came to Taris seeking aid for his home moon, after a chemical freighter containing hrucium-5 crashed there. The chemical harmed the moon's population and wildlife greatly, causing Senaru to leave for Taris to scan the toxic-resistant Tarisian wildlife, hoping to artificially adapt his moon's wildlife and his people to be resistant to toxins as well. He contacted Representative Lessah, who promised to help Senaru deliver the data to his people.

However, he realized how dangerous Taris really was, so he hired a Republic-aligned individual to perform the scans for him instead. The individual succeeded, delivering the data to Lessah, who was really helping him to further her career. After she revealed this, the individual chastised the representative for her selfish reasoning.

Senaru was created for Star Wars: The Old Republic, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by BioWare on December 20, 2011. He appears in the Taris mission "Disease on a Distant World".
